ti:translation.ti:label: Were the Athenians More Famous in War or in Wisdom?

ti:translation.ti:label: Whether the Athenians Were More Renowned For Their Warlike Achievements or For Their Learning
ti:translation.ti:description: Plutarch. Plutarch's Morals, Vol. V. Goodwin, William W., editor; Smith, R, translator. Boston. Little, Brown, and Company, 1874.
